title: Always a treat, amazing everything!
text: This beautiful hotel sits just east of the mountain. It’s location makes its beach nicely secluded, even though it is not far from the city. Our room is perfect, quiet and comfortable, and is directly above the dolphin pool. Service here is impeccable.
name: Bethany Watchon
